item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-19 Chances: Lyft’s CEO bullish on the company and invested $1 million in its stock. Lyft reports Q2 earnings and revenue estimates growth in rides. Introduction of ads and in-car services on its app to boost revenue. CEO’s positive outlook on the company’s turnaround.
